function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of pathogens through air and water systems","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for building occupants","Mitigation":"Implementation of efficient air and water filtration systems, control of airflows, and maintenance of water systems","Technologies":"Smart air quality control technologies, touchless technologies, self-cleaning spaces, efficient air filtration systems, and water decontamination technologies","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Spread of pathogens through wastewater and waste management","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Specific measures for limiting virus propagation in households, separate toilet facilities, and proper waste management strategies","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, separate toilet facilities, medical waste segregation, and waste disinfection technologies","People":"Building occupants, waste management staff","Owner":"Building owners, waste management staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate outdoor and activity spaces leading to poor mental health","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being of building occupants","Mitigation":"Requirement for outdoor spaces, sports facilities, and household-level activity spaces","Technologies":"Urban/community farming development, outdoor space design, and sports facility design","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners"}]}
